description.full: Download the official Happy Feet Two game demo, featuring four diverse levels and limitless fun. Play as Mumble and his best friend Ramon as they dance, slide, and race across Antarctica in a beat-bumping, feet-thumping, move-busting adventure to rescue their penguin nation featuring original music by GRAMMYÂ® award-winning artist Ozomatli. And for the ultimate experience, play in 3D!
description.short: Download the official Happy Feet Two game demo. Play as Mumble and his best friend Ramon in a beat-bumping adventure to rescue their penguin nation.
